syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

learning_objectives.description: understand that the photoelectric effect provides evidence for a particulate nature of electromagnetic radiation while phenomena such as interference and diffraction provide evidence for a wave nature
describe and interpret qualitatively the evidence provided by electron diffraction for the wave nature of particles
understand the de Broglie wavelength as the wavelength associated with a moving particle
